coreAttributes.name: armbinder
coreAttributes.description: An armbinder is a type of restraint devices primarily used in bondage play, its designed to bind the arms and hands to each other behind the back.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the armbinder around [npc.her] wrists, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the armbinder around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the armbinder around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before firmly fastening the straps in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the armbinder from around [npc.her] wrists, before taking them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the armbinder from around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before taking them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the armbinder from around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before yanking them off.
